features.name: Frenzy
features.description: When you enter a rage, you can choose to go into a frenzy. If you do so, you can make a single melee weapon attack as a bonus action on each of your turns after this one. When your rage ends, you suffer one level of exhaustion.

features.name: Mindless Rage
features.description: You cannot be charmed or frightened while raging. If you are charmed or frightened when you enter your rage, the effect is suspended for the duration of the rage.

features.name: Intimidating Presence
features.description: You can use your action to frighten someone. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw against your Barbarian spell save DC. On a failed save, the target is frightened for 1 minute or until it takes damage. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
